name: The Magic Hand
description:
The Magic Hands is a survival shooter where the objective is to hold out for as many rounds as possible. 

As the rounds progress, the difficulty of the enemies will increase exponentially, with the colours indicating their damage and endurance in this order from lowest to highest:  green - yellow - red - purple.

In addition, every 3 rounds a "special round" will appear with 1 of 3 possible changes in the environment: 

- Totem with a rotating laser beam (indestructible).

-Poison shells (be careful where you step on) 

-Total darkness (watch your back).

Controls:

- W A S D : Move the character.

-Move the mouse : Rotate the character's camera.

-Spacebar : Jump.

-Mouse wheel : Change weapons .

-Left click : Fire the equipped weapon.

-Right click : Zoom (exclusive to the purple weapon) .

Weapons:

-Red hand : Very effective at close range. 

-Blue hand : Low damage but high runic cadence. 

-Purple hand : Perfect for long range, especially when using his "zoom". exclusive to be able to do a lot of runic damage from far away (right click with the weapon equipped).

External assets: NATURE POLYGON, Free blood splash,  music from freesound.org. Everything else is made by us!
